pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, April 12, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will speak with the Leader of the Official Opposition, the Honourable Erin O’Toole, in advance of the Budget.

1:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will celebrate Vaisakhi by participating in a virtual discussion with front-line health care workers. Minister of National Defence Harjit Sajjan, Minister of Diversity and Inclusion and Youth Bardish Chagger, and Minister of Health Patty Hajdu will be in attendance.

2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Member of Parliament for Coquitlam—Port Coquitlam Ron McKinnon, will virtually meet with grade 12 students from Gleneagle Secondary School in Coquitlam, British Columbia.

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will speak with the Leader of the Bloc Québécois, Yves-François Blanchet, in advance of the Budget.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.
